name: Data Analyst
description:
Exness Group was founded in 2008 and is a dynamic, fast-moving organization that specializes in providing services for trading in the financial markets. Today Exness is rapidly growing, we are 1000+ represented by more than 71 nationalities, continuously expanding our existing teams and creating new ones.

Our culture allows each employee to be the best version of themselves, constantly increasing their expertise. Some of our key values are Ethics & integrity + Smart scientific approach (by creating our own scientific and algorithmic-driven product).

One of the Exness main functions is our Business Intelligence department in ☀️ Cyprus, where we are on a mission to find the best talents out there and are looking forward to adding Data Analyst to the following domains: Trading, Payments, Digital, User Journey, Business Development, KPI Management.

Why this role is important to us: the Business Intelligence department operates in a matrix teams model where individuals from different BI functions come together to facilitate the development of one of the company’s business functions using BI solutions, instruments, and support.

Responsibilities:

  • Ad hoc data analysis;
  • Develop, modify, and maintain data-driven processes in the Exness teams
  • Construct experiments and check hypotheses based on data;
  • Translate data analysis and data insights into visuals for non-technical audiences

Requirements:

  • Excellent data analysis skills (3-5+ years of BI/Analytics experience);
  • Good understanding of mathematical statistics and probability theory (correlations, effects, anomaly detection);
  • Experience with databases, strong knowledge of SQL
  • An analytical and critical thinker who can model and interpret data to drive decisions
  • Ability to formalize and visualize the results of the data analysis;
  • Ability to organize and prioritize tasks efficiently and to handle multiple, simultaneous deadlines;
  • Excellent verbal and written communication, fluent Russian and upper-intermediate English (written and spoken).

As a plus:

  • Mathematical/ engineering education;
  • Experience with predictive modeling;
  • Python programming experience;
  • Experience working with BI tools (Tableau as a plus);
  • Algorithmic trading experience.

We offer:

  • Medical insurance for employees.
  • Coworking expenses compensation.
  • “Get to know your Team” trip to Cyprus.
  • Sports activities compensation.
  • Extensive learning opportunities.
  • Flexible public holidays.
  • 100% payment of Annual leave.
  • Professional Development.

*If you would like to learn about relocation opportunities to Cyprus, please contact the dedicated TA Specialist.

❗️Your application will be reviewed further and you will receive an update in due course if you are shortlisted. Due to the high volume of applicants, we are able to contact only shortlisted candidates at this point in time.
